FuncDef: This command displays information for the number of IPsec tunnel statistics of the specified tunnel type and scope. The system collects statistics every hour for the last 24 hour according to the wall clock. The current value is also included in the output.
CLIs: number-of-tunnels tunnel-type <tunnel-type> gateway <name> [ history-stats-in-count <count> ] [ history-stats-in-min <minutes> ] [ current ] [ show-oid ]
number-of-tunnels tunnel-type <tunnel-type> isa <mda> [ history-stats-in-count <count> ] [ history-stats-in-min <minutes> ] [ current ] [ show-oid ]
number-of-tunnels tunnel-type <tunnel-type> system [ history-stats-in-count <count> ] [ history-stats-in-min <minutes> ] [ current ] [ show-oid ]
number-of-tunnels tunnel-type <tunnel-type> tunnel-group <tunnel-group-id> [ history-stats-in-count <count> ] [ history-stats-in-min <minutes> ] [ current ] [ show-oid ]

ParaDef.Info: Displays information about the specified the tunnel type. Values-all, sl2l, dl2l, ra.
Displays information about the specified ISA ID. Values-slot/mda.
Displays information about the specified tunnel group ID. Values-1 to 16.
Displays information about the specified IPsec GW name up to 32 characters in length.
Displays information for the number of statistics intervals to be displayed (starting with the most recent). Values-1 to 96.
Displays information about the specified period covered by the statistics to be displayed (starting with the most recent). Values-1 to 1440.
Displays information about the current value. The values of count and minutes are ignored by the system once this parameter is specified.
Displays information about the Object Identifier (OID) of the current statistical value.
